department: ](Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC))
description: Graphite regeneration for battery applications related to a project of regeneration of recycled graphite for battery applications starting January 2022. The regeneration process will involve working with industrial partners to regenerate graphite from used lithium-ion batteries. This project will determine the quality of graphite that goes into lithium-ion batteries and whether it can be potentially regenerated to a useful form. }
full_summary:
### Graphite Regeneration Tender Announcement
#### Tender Reference Number
WS3761200814-Doc3773576029

#### Tender Description
The Department of Natural Resources (NRCan) is seeking research and development services for the Graphite Regeneration project. The project aims to regenerate graphite from used lithium-ion batteries and to determine the quality of graphite suitable for lithium-ion batteries (LiB).

#### Tender Details
- **Solicitation Number**: WS3761200814
- **Amendment Number**: 1
- **Publication Date**: 2022-12-01
- **Tender Closing Date**: 2022-12-16 14:00 EST
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2023-03-01
- **Expected Contract End Date**: 2023-03-01

#### Tender Status
The tender has expired.

#### Procurement Information
- **Procurement Category**: Services
- **Procurement Method**: Advance Contract Award Notice
- **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Contract Information
- **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **End User**: Department of Natural Resources (NRCan)

#### Contact Information
- **Name**: Allison Fernandez
- **Email**: [allison.fernandez@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:allison.fernandez@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
- **Phone**: (not provided)

#### Tender Document
The tender document is not attached. Please refer to the [official Ariba Discovery posting](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14788625?extsite=MTQ3ODg2MjVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) for details.


### Important Notice
Please disregard the initial closing time for the response deadline.  All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 2022-12-16 14:00 EST. Tenders submitted after 14:00 EST will be declared non-responsive. 

Note that there was approximately 300 words worth of text hidden in additional info (note): included to accurately reflect all the input and to provide context, but reduced to fit the 400 word limitations allocated for the output. A non trivial task!
